title: Task1
description: The RTK Usage Guide docs page explains the standard usage patterns for each of RTK's APIs. The API Reference section describes each API function and has additional usage examples.

title: Task3
description: We previously had a set of Basic/Intermediate/Advanced tutorials directly in the Redux Toolkit docs. They were helpful, but we've removed them in favor of pointing.
